function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of Coronavirus through air conditioning systems","Impact":"Spread of infection to multiple families in a closed space","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of air conditioning systems, use of air purifiers, and improvement of ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C light disinfection, and improved ventilation systems","People":"Patrons and staff of air-conditioned spaces","Owner":"Restaurant owners and building management"}]}
